QuestData.Title: Forgemaster Pyrendius
QuestData.Description: A terrible evil squats in the heart of this cavern, $n. Forgemaster Pyrendius has personally crafted many of the cursed weapons that Twilight's Hammer is using in their conquest of the realms above.$B$BBefore we leave these lands of flame... Pyrendius must die.$B$BHe will not go down easy. But, if I'm reading the tome correctly, we can briefly open up small gateways to the Abyssal Maw, the realm of water. Lure Pyrendius onto a portal rune and activate it to weaken him!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Use the runes that circle Pyrendius to destroy him. He's too strong to fight alone!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Forgemaster Pyrendius. Lure him onto the Portal Runes and use them to weaken him.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is Pyrendius dead? This ashen heat of this cave is suffocating me!
QuestData.RewardText: It is done! We'll seal this fiery hole up behind us and let the minions of the Twilight's Hammer discover the corpses we left behind. We couldn't have done it without you, $n!
